description: '''Biker metal''' (also known as '''biker punk''') is a [[fusion genre]] that combines elements of [[punk rock]], [[heavy metal music|heavy metal]], [[rock and roll]] and [[blues]], that was pioneered in the late-1970s to early-1980s in England and the United States, by [[Mot√∂rhead]], [[Plasmatics]], [[Anti-Nowhere League]] and [[Girlschool]].
